docs.title: Welcome to the Castopod User Guide
docs.text:
The Castopod User Guide

Welcome to the Castopod user guide! This guide shows you how to set up your instance and create and publish your podcast using Castopod.

For developer documentation visit castopod.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Installing Castopod
docs.text: Please visit the official Castopod documentation for requirements and installation instructions.
